com.ihealth.communication.control

Class Hs5ControlForBt

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ihealth.communication.control.Hs5ControlForBt

  • public class Hs5ControlForBt
extends java.lang.Object
    Public API for the HS5 bluetooth

    The class provides methods to control HS5 device. You need to call the device method, and then call the connection method

    If you want to connect a HS5 device, you need to call iHealthDevicesManager.startDiscovery(long) to discovery a new HS5 device, and then call iHealthDevicesManager.connectDevice(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)to connect HS5 device.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hs5ControlForBt(com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseComm mBaseComm, java.lang.String mac, java.lang.String type, com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseCommCallback baseCommCallback, com.ihealth.communication.ins.InsCallback insCallback)
      A constructor for Hs5ControForBt.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void disconnect()
      Disconnect the device
      void init()
      Notify the Hs5 Bluetooth connected
      void setWifi(java.lang.String ssid, int type, java.lang.String pw)
      set the wifi to the scale This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately. During the progress, following callback will be triggered:
      iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
      The action will be: HsProfile.ACTION_SETTINGWIFI HsProfile.ACTION_SETWIFI_SUCCESS HsProfile.ACTION_SETWIFI_FAIL HsProfile.ACTION_SETWIFI_UNKNOW The message is null. If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
      iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
      The action will be HsProfile.ACTION_ERROR_HS The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
      the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Hs5ControlForBt

        public Hs5ControlForBt(com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseComm mBaseComm,

                       java.lang.String type,
                       com.ihealth.communication.base.comm.BaseCommCallback baseCommCallback,
                       com.ihealth.communication.ins.InsCallback insCallback)
        A constructor for Hs5ControForBt.
        Parameters:
        mBaseComm - class for communication.
        mac - valid Bluetooth address(without colon).
        type - type of iHealth device iHealthDevicesManager.TYPE_HS5_BT
        baseCommCallback - communication callback.
        insCallback - Hs5 Bluetooth device callback.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
        Notify the Hs5 Bluetooth connected

      • disconnect

        public void disconnect()
        Disconnect the device

      • setWifi

        public void setWifi(java.lang.String ssid,
                    int type,
                    java.lang.String pw)
        set the wifi to the scale
        • This is an asynchronous call, it will return immediately.
        • During the progress, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be:
            • HsProfile.ACTION_SETTINGWIFI
            • HsProfile.ACTION_SETWIFI_SUCCESS
            • HsProfile.ACTION_SETWIFI_FAIL
            • HsProfile.ACTION_SETWIFI_UNKNOW
          • The message is null.
        • If error happens, following callback will be triggered:
          iHealthDevicesCallback.onDeviceNotify(String mac, String deviceType, String action, String message)
          • The action will be HsProfile.ACTION_ERROR_HS
          • The message will be a JSON string with error ID and description,
            the keys will show in the KeyList of the action.
        • Attention, it is mandatory to call following method before you call this method:
          iHealthDevicesManager.registerClientCallback(iHealthDevicesCallback)
        Parameters:
        ssid - The ssid of the wifi.
        type - Reserved parameter, default 0.
        pw - The password of the wifi.
